lead_paragraph: According to documents released at his arraignment in State Supreme Court in Manhattan on Tuesday, Cory Dunton, the suspect in a shooting last month at the Bryant Park skating rink, asked for a pen and paper after hearing that a victim in the shooting might have been left paralyzed.
